name: mieux-voter-openapi
description: OpenAPI specifications for a Majority Judgment polling application made by MieuxVoter.fr

scripts.build: openapi bundle --output ./mv-openapi.yaml ./openapi/mv-openapi-root.yaml && sed -i '1s/^/# Warning: this file has been automatically generated. All manual modifications will be lost, see README.md for details.\n/' ./mv-openapi.yaml
